name: HIKEBOY
description:
HIKEBOY Traverse all 3 dimensions as you hike your way to victory!

Hike around a magical world using your stunning CLIMBING ABILITIES. Yes, much like in 3D games such as Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, you can climb walls in this game, travelling along the X, Y, and Z axes. However, climbing requires STAMINA, meaning that not every surface is easy to conquer. Travel across the map to collect BOLTS which will boost your STAMINA so you can climb to victory!

Everything here was custom-made, from the code to the art to the music.

This game was created in ~24 hours for the Mix and Game Jam.
